title: Triceratops
longDescription:
3d model https://skfb.ly/6AVEB

Animations https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_vdghqH08Fc&feature=youtu.be

Animated 3D model for games, applications and educational presentations, etc.


v1.2.4-Fixed swim animations (dinosaur body moved up and now walk animation blends smoothly with swim animation)

-Added transition animations Aggressive_Run_Start, Aggressive_Walk_Back_Start, Aggressive_Walk_Start

Run_Start, Walk_Back_Start, Walk_Start Root and InPlace

-Added High Resolution model 38096 tris 20756 verts

v1.2.3-Fixed Walk_Right animation

v1.2.3-Fixed triceratops "scale bug" the scale of the root bone was 2.54

-Added Roar and Additive Roar animations

v1.2.2 -Fixed UV and skinning

-Fixed root bone orientation

-Animations optimized (Run Left, Run Right... etc.) for blend

-Added Poses (Head Left, Right, Up... etc.)
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • LODs and High Resolution model for cinematics scenes
  • Root bone
  • Animations with RootMotion and InPlace
  • PBR
  • UV-layout mirrored

Rigged: Yes

Rigged to Epic skeleton: No

Animated: Yes

Number of Animations: 91 animations (Root Motion and InPlace) 9 poses

Idle, IdleBreak, IdleEat, Walk, WalkBack, WalkLeft,

WalkRight, StrafeLeft, StrafeRight, TurnLeft,TurnRight,

Run, RunLeft, RunRight, Attack, AttackLeft, AttackRight,

HitLeft, HitRight, Stun, LieDown, Sleep, WakeUp, FallingLeft, FallingRight,

AgressiveIdle, AgressiveIdleBreak, AgressiveAttack,

AgressiveWalk, AgressiveWalkBack, AgressiveStrafeLeft,

AgressiveStrafeRight, AgressiveTurnLeft, AgressiveTurnRight,

AgressiveRun, AgressiveRunLeft, AgressiveRunRight,

SwimmingIdle, Swimming, SwimmingLeft, SwimmingRight,

SwimmingTurnLeft, SwimmingTurnRight, SwimmingStun

AdditiveAttack, AdditiveAttackRight, AdditiveAttackLeft

Pose_Head_Down, Head_Left, Head_Left_Down,

Head_Left_Up, Right, Right_Down, Right_Up, Straight, Up

Animation types: Root Motion and In-place

Number of characters: 3

Vertex counts of characters:

LOD0 9224 tris 5486 verts

LOD1 3950 tris 2585 verts

LOD2 1876 tris 1351 verts

LOD3 496 tris 523 verts

High Resolution model 38096 tris 20756 verts

(Separate LOD's models included)

Number of Materials and Material Instances: 1 material 3 instances

Number of Textures:

Texture Resolutions: 4096x4096 Albedo (3 colors), Normal, MRAO (R-Metallic, G-Roughness, B-Ambient Occlusion)

For Any Development Platforms
